fixes.name: TC_Value
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR WindowMax =
    CALCULATE(
        MAX('Data (Complaint Line)'[Value]),
        ALLSELECTED('Data (Complaint Line)')
    )
RETURN
    WindowMax
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted WINDOW_MAX(MAX([Value])) to a measure that calculates the MAX of 'Data (Complaint Line)'[Value] over the current selected window using ALLSELECTED to emulate the table-calculation window context. This must be a measure because WINDOW_MAX is a table calculation (aggregate over a window).

fixes.name: TC_Start Point
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR RunningSum =
    SUMX(
        ALLSELECTED('Data (Complaint Line)'),
        'Data (Complaint Line)'[TC_Value]
    )
RETURN
    RunningSum - 'Data (Complaint Line)'[TC_Value]
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated RUNNING_SUM([TC_Value]) - [TC_Value] into DAX. RUNNING_SUM was mapped to a SUMX over ALLSELECTED to approximate the running/window sum context; the measure then subtracts the current row's TC_Value. The calculation is a measure because it relies on table calculations (RUNNING_SUM) / windowed aggregation logic.
